short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that assists in writing ITDs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Usage Info:
If you open any document with ITDs, you will be prompted to open ITDMate. But you always have the option to open via the extension popup or the sidebar if you're on a google doc page.

What It Does:
ITDs (Important Technical Decisions) are technical documentation that is written to justify key technical decisions being made in the lifecycle of a software project. These decisions help communicate to other stakeholders about the options that were considered to solve a problem and the rationale behind selecting a specific option. This extension provides assistance using AI capabilities to help improve the quality of the ITDs written across the organization through various checks that are run against a submitted text.
